DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To determine feasibility 12-month community-based combined physical activity dietary change weight-loss intervention overweight sedentary female breast colorectal cancer survivor recruit via Southwest Oncology Group ( SWOG ) . - To estimate effect size intervention weight loss 12 month . Secondary - To measure change anthropometric measure baseline ( body mass index [ BMI ] , waist hip circumference ) 6 12 month body composition ( % body fat assessed dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry [ DXA ] scan ) 12 month . - To measure change minute spend per week moderate-to-vigorous aerobic activity baseline use Curves attendance record 7-day physical activity assessment 6 12 month . - To measure change baseline 6 12 month dietary intake carotenoid via serum carotenoid measure . - To assess change baseline 6 12 month perceive benefit dietary change , physical activity , weight loss cancer diagnosis . - To measure change baseline metabolic hormonal biomarkers associate breast colorectal cancer recurrence risk ( fast insulin , fast glucose , hemoglobin A1C , bioavailable estradiol , free testosterone , adiponectin ) 6 12 month . - To assess change baseline anxiety , depression , fatigue , sleep , satisfaction social role , pain , physical function use PROMISE-43 6 12 month . - To assess baseline predictor ( medical history , health behavior , quality life ) subject adhere complete intervention . - To assess diversity subject enroll complete intervention . - To assess availability acceptability Curves fitness center 12 month . - To explore change DNA methylation . - To assess intervention study process via open-ended interview SWOG sit Curves franchise . - To measure change anthropometric measure assess feasibility extend follow-up 24 36 month . - To assess safety Curves® fitness center population assess self-reported change lymphedema injury measure 6 12 month . OUTLINE : Participants stratify accord type cancer ( breast v colorectal ) . Participants instructed practice 30-45 minute medium-to-hard exercise 5-7 day week Curves fitness center ( pay study ) outside Curves 12 month . Participants receive write material physical activity guideline survivor pedometer track physical activity outside Curves . They also receive Curves Fitness & Weight Management Plan instruct follow `` high carbohydrate '' diet plan , promote 1,500 kcal/day diet high fruit vegetable consist 30 % protein , 45 % carbohydrate , 25 % fat . In addition , participant receive dietary guideline cancer survivor , recommend eat 5 serving fruit/vegetables per day , diet high whole grain , low saturate fat , low sugary food , low alcohol . Participants receive 14 behavioral-counseling session telephone goal increase intervention adherence participation retention . Each session last 40 minute occurs weekly week 1-5 every 6 week month 6 . Participants receive monthly email newsletter health tip motivational message encourage adherence retention study program . Counselors also conduct three 24-hour dietary recall assessment 1 physical activity assessment 6 12 month . Participants complete PROMIS-43 quality-of-life questionnaire 6 12 month via internet , mail , telephone . Participants also undergo blood sample collection baseline 6 12 month fast glucose insulin test , biomarker study . Anthropometric measurement ( height , weight , waist , hip circumference ) also collect . After completion study intervention , participant follow 24 36 month .
